response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. It's worth $8,000 to you, just like it is to me. Considering its value and quality, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $7,200. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that is both valuable and highly sought after. Let's make this deal happen!", "product_price": 7200}
